Source: vignettes/tutorial/project_setup_child.Rmd
project_setup_child.Rmd

On how to use the R6 class Project, click here.

Setup script:

library(fxtract)
## Lade nötiges Paket: lubridate
## 
## Attache Paket: 'lubridate'
## The following object is masked from 'package:base':
## 
##     date
my_project = Project$new("my_project")
## No readable configuration file found
## Created registry in 'L:/Users/auj/Desktop/Git/fxtract/vignettes/tutorial/projects/my_project/reg' using cluster functions 'Interactive'
my_project$add_data(iris, group_by = "Species")
## Warning: executing %dopar% sequentially: no parallel backend registered
## 
## Attache Paket: 'dplyr'
## The following objects are masked from 'package:lubridate':
## 
##     intersect, setdiff, union
## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
## 
##     filter, lag
## The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
## 
##     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
## Saving raw RDS file setosa.RDS on disk.
## Saving raw RDS file versicolor.RDS on disk.
## Saving raw RDS file virginica.RDS on disk.
## Adding problem 'setosa'
## Adding problem 'versicolor'
## Adding problem 'virginica'
fun1 = function(data) {
  c(mean_sepal_length = mean(data$Sepal.Length),
    sd_sepal_length = sd(data$Sepal.Length))
}

fun2 = function(data) {
  c(mean_petal_length = mean(data$Petal.Length),
    sd_petal_length = sd(data$Petal.Length))
}

my_project$add_feature(fun1)
## Exporting new objects: 'fun1' ...
## Adding algorithm 'fun1'
## Adding 1 experiments ('setosa'[1] x 'fun1'[1] x repls[1]) ...
## Adding 1 experiments ('versicolor'[1] x 'fun1'[1] x repls[1]) ...
## Adding 1 experiments ('virginica'[1] x 'fun1'[1] x repls[1]) ...
my_project$add_feature(fun2)
## Exporting new objects: 'fun2' ...
## Adding algorithm 'fun2'
## Adding 1 experiments ('setosa'[1] x 'fun2'[1] x repls[1]) ...
## Adding 1 experiments ('versicolor'[1] x 'fun2'[1] x repls[1]) ...
## Adding 1 experiments ('virginica'[1] x 'fun2'[1] x repls[1]) ...
my_project$calc_features()
## Submitting 6 jobs in 6 chunks using cluster functions 'Interactive' ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'setosa' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun1' on problem 'setosa' for job 1 (seed = 11923) ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'versicolor' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun1' on problem 'versicolor' for job 2 (seed = 11924) ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'virginica' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun1' on problem 'virginica' for job 3 (seed = 11925) ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'setosa' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun2' on problem 'setosa' for job 4 (seed = 11926) ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'versicolor' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun2' on problem 'versicolor' for job 5 (seed = 11927) ...
## ### [bt]: Generating problem instance for problem 'virginica' ...
## ### [bt]: Applying algorithm 'fun2' on problem 'virginica' for job 6 (seed = 11928) ...
